solution_line_template: In {happy_minutes} minutes, she happy tweets for {happy_minutes}*{happy_tweets_per_minute}=<<{happy_minutes}*{happy_tweets_per_minute}={total_happy_tweets}>>{total_happy_tweets} times
In {hungry_minutes} minutes, she hungry-tweets for {hungry_minutes}*{hungry_tweets_per_minute}=<<{hungry_minutes}*{hungry_tweets_per_minute}={total_hungry_tweets}>>{total_hungry_tweets} times

In {reflection_minutes} minutes, she tweets at her reflection {reflection_minutes}*{reflection_tweets_per_minute}=<<{reflection_minutes}*{reflection_tweets_per_minute}={total_reflection_tweets}>>{total_reflection_tweets} times
